mapper.select: SELECT COMU_BNO, COMU_TITLE, COMU_CONTENT, USER_ID, COMU_HIT, COMU_DATE FROM COMMUNITY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMU_BNO, COMU_TITLE, COMU_CONTENT, USER_ID, COMU_HIT, COMU_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMU_BNO), 0) + 1 FROM COMMUNITY ), #{comu_title }, #{ comu_content }, #{ user_id }, #{ comu_hit }, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') )
